title: Agave crop segmentation and maturity classification with deep learning data-centric strategies using very high-resolution satellite imagery. (arXiv:2303.11564v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: The responsible and sustainable agave-tequila production chain is fundamental for the social, environment and economic development of Mexico's agave regions. translated_title: 利用高分辨率卫星图像的深度学习数据策略进行龙舌兰作物分割和成熟度分类
translated_abstract: 负责任和可持续的龙舌兰-龙舌兰酒生产链对墨西哥龙舌兰地区的社会、环境和经济发展至关重要。因此，开发新工具以实现大规模自动龙舌兰地区监测变得尤为重要。本文提出使用高分辨率卫星图像进行龙舌兰作物分割和成熟度分类的方法，该方法对于此任务可能会有所帮助。
tldr: 本研究利用高分辨率卫星图像采用深度学习数据策略解决了龙舌兰作物分割中的问题，并提出了龙舌兰作物成熟度分类方法。
en_tdlr: This study proposes a method for agave crop segmentation and maturity classification using very high resolution satellite imagery and deep learning data strategies to tackle real-world problems in the context of agave crop segmentation. The proposed strategies include active learning and synthetic image creation with human supervision to improve segmentation performance, and a method for classifying agave crop maturity.
